shorttext: Made with a blend of greenhouse-grown cannabis, Reign Drops has a strong THC potency with a ratio of 30:0 of THC to CBD. Available in a 40 ml bottle.
title: Reign Drops - 30:0 (30 mg/ml THC, 0 mg/ml CBD)
description: With a 30:0 ratio of THC to CBD, Reign Drops by Redecan is a blend of greenhouse-grown cannabis with a strong THC potency. Formulated in Niagara, Ontario, this oil is put through a state-of-the-art ethanol extraction process and diluted to optimal concentration. Reign Drops is available in a 40 ml bottle. All oil products sold at OCS.ca are meant for ingestion only. DO NOT smoke or vape these oils. Use as directed.

variants.title: 40ml
variants.name: Reign Drops - 30:0 (30 mg/ml THC, 0 mg/ml CBD) - 40ml
